nodes.text: The Xolochi Dreadnought was a cruiser-class type starship used by Xim's empire before the Galactic Republic. Several of this class of starship served in Xim's fleet. One also served as part of a task force to the planet Galuch at that time.
The Xolochi Dreadnought was designed by Ian Fullwood. He chose to give it a cigar-shaped hull specifically to draw out the reflection surface on the ship.
